tool_description: Get all the data, Posts on liveuamap with geocoded records
name: Maeplets Liveuamap
title: Maeplets Liveuamap

api_list.name: Get Post Data
api_list.description: Once you have your post id from the getdate or search api we can now grab the actual date of the post with this end point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/post/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/post/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Date
api_list.description: Returns a list of post ids from the specific date you passed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/getdate/01-2-2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/getdate/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Title
api_list.description: Get Post Ids by searching a query, this endpoint will return a bunch of titles and their post ID. You can use the /post end point to get the data of actual post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/searchtitle/trump"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/searchtitle/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Dates
api_list.description:
Get all dates stored by the API, and the total count of posts per date.

Note: The date id is used to query for Ids in the getdate end point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com/getdates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maeplets-liveuamap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
